oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Amazing Grace, performance by the Pulaski Prayer Society
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pulaski Prayer Society
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Finding Community
Religious Institutions
Spirituals (Songs)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: John Work III field recording of the classic sacred song, Amazing Grace. This performance, an example of "leader and congregation" singing, features the Pulaski Prayer Society led by Elder C.W. Gray.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Center for Popular Music, Middle Tennessee State University
